ref: 4546 cakramarda m. ʻ Cassia tora ʼ Suśr., ˚aka -- m. lex. [Like cakragaja -- , cakrapadmāṭa -- ʻ id. ʼ ← Drav. EWA i 366. By pop. etym. ʻ destroying the circle i.e. ringworm ʼ. -- cakrá -- , marda -- ]
H. cakwãd, ˚kaũdā, ˚kū̃dā, cakwãṛ, ˚kaũṛ, ˚kõṛ m. ʻ the plant Cassia tora (used as a remedy for ringworm) ʼ.
